scripts.build:web: flutter clean && flutter build web --web-renderer canvaskit --release
scripts.cocoapods:nuke: npm run cocoapods:nuke:ios && npm run cocoapods:nuke:macos
scripts.cocoapods:nuke:ios: cd ios && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf Podfile.lock && pod deintegrate && pod setup && pod install --repo-update
scripts.cocoapods:nuke:macos: cd macos && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf Podfile.lock && pod deintegrate && pod setup && pod install --repo-update
scripts.fastlane:update: npm run fastlane:update:ios && npm run fastlane:update:macos && npm run fastlane:update:android
scripts.generate: npm run generate:environment && npm run generate:assets && npm run generate:build_runner && npm run generate:localization
scripts.generate:assets: dart pub global activate spider && spider build
scripts.git:ignore: npm run git:ignore:firebase && npm run git:ignore:changelog
scripts.prepare: husky install && npm run git:ignore && flutter pub get
scripts.prepare:keychain: npm run prepare:keychain:ios && npm run prepare:keychain:macos
scripts.prepare:keychain:ios: cd ios && bundle exec fastlane keychain_create && bundle exec fastlane keychain_setup
scripts.prepare:keychain:macos: cd macos && bundle exec fastlane keychain_create && bundle exec fastlane keychain_setup
scripts.release:flavor:edge: cross-env HUSKY=0 git commit --no-verify --allow-empty -m "release(testflight): edge" -m "[skip ci]"
scripts.release:flavor:beta: cross-env HUSKY=0 git commit --no-verify --allow-empty -m "release(testflight): beta" -m "[skip ci]"
scripts.release:prepare: npm run cocoapods:nuke && npm run generate && npm run fastlane:update
scripts.version: npm run version:pubspec && npm run version:snapcraft
